title: Alpha Client Wont Work
body:
so today when I got home, I saw that I was able to get the new client that is in alpha, so of course, excited as hell I got it, but whenever I try to run it, it just gives me a dark blue screen where the client should be, and it doesn't change, I have tried running it in as administrator and it still does not work, please help me, I really really really reeeeaaallly want to try out this new client cause it looks amazing in the pictures on the website. 

{{item:3151}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I have check the alpha and the pbe alpha client . both dose not include item set feature plz dont delete me u r planing to kill it.
This feature is good to plan for build explain or compare items. it is also good for champs who can have totally different build like udyr

That's really strange!  Make sure to have NA region selected on the top right of the boards page to make sure you're routing correctly.  If the issue persists, see if you can get there through another browser, incognito mode, or [clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Hope that helps!

I don't have a lot of insight on this, but the blank screen sounds like your network can't connect to the client.  See if the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help troubleshoot this.  If your issue persists, I recommend reaching out to the [Alpha Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) to let testers know about this.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AMiK4QqL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-23T16:42:11.228+0000)
>
> I don't have a lot of insight on this, but the blank screen sounds like your network can't connect to the client.  See if the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help troubleshoot this.  If your issue persists, I recommend reaching out to the [Alpha Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work) to let testers know about this.  Hope that helps!

There seems to be an issue with your Alpha Boards link it brings me to this instead of the actual alpha boards. I was brought here from another topic where i had clicked it.
